trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used to configure how the service authenticates users that use user name/password authentication and to configure the caching of logon tokens.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 사용자 이름/암호 인증을 사용 하는 사용자를 인증 하는 방법을 구성 하 고 로그온 토큰의 캐싱을 구성 하는 데 사용 되는 클래스를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured for user name/password-based authentication, the relevant properties for this class are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에서 사용 하는 바인딩이 구성 된 사용자 이름/암호 기반 인증을 위해,이 클래스에 대 한 관련 속성은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These properties include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 속성에 포함 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured to use Windows authentication for user name/password, the settings related to caching of logon tokens are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에서 사용 하는 바인딩이 없는 사용자 이름/암호에 대 한 Windows 인증을 사용 하도록 구성 된, 로그온 토큰의 캐싱과 관련 된 설정이 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These settings include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 설정에 포함 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length of time that a token is cached.
trans-unit.target: 토큰이 캐시 되는 최대 기간을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the maximum length of time that a token is cached`.` The default is 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>토큰이 캐시 되는 최대 기간을 나타내는`.` 기본값은 15 분.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether logon tokens are cached.
trans-unit.target: 로그온 토큰이 캐시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security asks the Windows security subsystem to create a logon token for every incoming user name/password security token if the user name is being mapped to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 보안 토큰을 만들려면 로그온 모든 들어오는 사용자 이름/암호 보안 토큰에 대 한 사용자 이름이 Windows 계정에 매핑되는 경우 Windows 보안 하위 시스템을 요청 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여이 동작을 변경할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses Win32's `LogonUser` function for user name/password authentication.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>모드, 서비스에 사용&32;의 `LogonUser` 사용자 이름/암호 인증에 대 한 함수.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: If the CacheLogonTokens is set to `true`, the resulting Windows token is cached and reused for the same user name/password pair.
trans-unit.target: CacheLogonTokens로 설정 되어 있으면 `true`, 결과 Windows 토큰이 캐시 되 고 동일한 사용자 이름/암호 쌍에 다시 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The cache is valid for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 캐시는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A> 에 유효

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of caches is limited to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 최대 캐시 수 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> 제한 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if logon tokens are cached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>로그온 토큰이 캐시 되는지; 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 사용자 이름 및 암호 유효성 검사기를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> to take effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>속성으로 설정 되어 있어야 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>에 대 한는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>적용 되려면.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>속성을 설정 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>속성이 아닙니다 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 의 값을 무시 하 고 Windows 인증을 사용 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>모드, 서비스에 사용 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>호출 하 여 사용자 이름/암호 인증을 위해는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 사용자 이름 및 암호 유효성 검사기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the security context.
trans-unit.target: Windows 그룹이 보안 컨텍스트에 포함 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios when validating Windows user names and passwords, Windows groups in which users belong provide useful information for authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 시나리오에서 Windows 사용자 이름 및 암호 유효성을 검사 하는 사용자가 속한 Windows 그룹 권한 부여 결정에 대 한 유용한 정보를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 Windows 그룹이 필요 하지 않은 경우이 속성을 설정 `false` 전체 그룹 클레임 채우기를 사용 하지 않음으로써 성능을 향상 시킬 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Windows 그룹이 보안 컨텍스트에;에 포함 된 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: 캐시할 최대 로그온 토큰 수를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 128.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 128입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: 캐시할 로그온 토큰의 최대 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 자격 공급자를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>모드, 서비스에 사용 <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>호출 하 여 사용자 이름/암호 인증을 위해는 <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the MembershipProvider to take effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>속성으로 설정 되어 있어야 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>적용 되려면 MembershipProvider에 대 한.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the MembershipProvider property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the MembershipProvider property.
trans-unit.target: MembershipProvider 속성을 설정 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>속성이 않습니다 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] MembershipProvider 속성의 값을 무시 하 고 Windows 인증을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> property is set to `MembershipProvider` and the `MembershipProvider` property is not set to a value, the default is the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>속성이 `MembershipProvider` 및 `MembershipProvider` 속성이 값으로 설정 되어 있지, 기본값은 <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>클래스</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for this service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>이 서비스에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 자격 증명이 읽기 전용일 때이 속성을 설정 하려고 시도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method of validating the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 이름 및 암호 유효성 검사 메서드를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> If this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the service uses the object returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> to validate user names and passwords in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 값은:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>이 속성을 설정 하는 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, 서비스에서 반환 된 개체를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>들어오는 메시지에 사용자 이름 및 암호 유효성을 검사 하려면.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) using transport-level security and the UserNamePasswordValidationMode property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the custom authentication scheme uses a subset of Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 때는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] UserNamePasswordValidationMode 속성을로 설정 하 고 서비스가 호스트에서 인터넷 정보 서비스 (IIS) 전송 수준 보안을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, 사용자 지정 인증 스키마에서는 Windows 인증의 하위 집합을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: That is because in this scenario, IIS performs Windows authentication prior to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] invoking the custom authenticator.
trans-unit.target: IIS에서이 시나리오에서는 이전에 Windows 인증을 수행 하기 때문 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 사용자 지정 인증자를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, specify the membership provider by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property, and then the membership provider instance specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is used to validate the username and password in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값으로 설정 된 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>를 설정 하 여 멤버 자격 공급자를 지정는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>에 지정 된 속성을 멤버 자격 공급자 인스턴스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>속성 이름과 들어오는 메시지의 암호의 유효성을 검사 하는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 열거형에서 가져온 값 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"> </xref>합니다.
